facts.fact: You cannot breathe on the moon.
facts.reason: Because the moon doesn’t have an atmosphere. Astronauts need a suit, filled with air, to breathe.

facts.fact: If you would travel to the moon with a car, you will need six month.
facts.reason: The moon is far away, approximately 370.000 kilometers.  A journey with a space ship takes 3 days.

facts.fact: All the flags on the moon are now white
facts.reason: Because of the extreme conditions, the flags got bleached. For example, the temperature difference is between 150° and -150°.

facts.fact: The moon is the reason for tides
facts.reason: His weight is about 73 trillions kilogram. He pulls the water on the earth.

facts.fact: There are two golf balls on the moon
facts.reason: The astronaut Al Shepard was the first golf player on the moon. He took two balls and one golf club to the moon.

facts.fact: Everything is enormously lightweight on the moon
facts.reason: The gravity is very low compared to the gravity of the earth. A human, who weigh 90 kilogram, would weigh 15 kilogram on the moon. This is the reason, why astronauts can jump on the moon

facts.fact: On 21 July 1969 the first humans, Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin, arrived the moon
facts.reason: It was a big human dream, to fly to moon. This dream got true with the Apollo 11 Mission, which was the first spaceflight that landed humans on the Moon. Armstrong and Aldrin spent about two hours on the moon, to make studies and to place the american flag.
